idea-plugin.name: Php Inspections (EA Extended)
idea-plugin.description:
Extended inspections set for PhpStorm.
Detects:
- possible code constructs simplifications
- weak types control (important in Enterprise Applications)
- micro-optimization cases (eg un-necessary double quotes)
- confusing code constructs

Some of inspections expecting that conditional statements (eg. if) are using group statement to wrap body expressions. If this requirement is fulfilled then additional inspections are taking place.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
6 Dec 2014: added 2 new inspections
- non optimized arrays mapping locator
- ambiguous count call in for loop
